DOC.brief_summary: Overweight patient type 2 diabetes often treat intensified insulin therapy . However , many case , even high insulin dosage ( > 100 U per day ) achieve satisfy metabolic control . A new therapy option necessary make possible low daily insulin requirement improve metabolic control . The aim study investigate whether protein-rich meal replacement suitable low daily insulin requirement reduce HbA1c body weight .
DOC.brief_title: Metabolic Activation With Almased Type 2 Diabetes Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The pilot study include patient type 2 diabetes ( n=22 ) , inject > 100 U insulin daily . During first week , three main meal replace 50 g protein-rich meal replacement ( Almased ) ( =1100 kcal per day ) . During week 2-4 , two meal replace protein-rich lunch allow . During week 5-12 , dinner replace . Clinical parameter determine begin study , 4 , 8 12 week well 1.5 year follow-up . Wilcoxon sign rank test use intention-to-treat analysis Mann-Whitney test subgroup analysis .
DOC.criteria: patient type 2 diabetes BMI > 27 kg/m2 age 3575 year insulin therapy > 100 U insulin per day contraindication calorie reduce diet
